column4: Hello, Whenever firefox is running i cannot watch movies, they are displayed frame by frame, did anyone had this sort of problem ?
Hello, Whenever firefox is running i cannot watch movies, they are displayed frame by frame, did anyone had this sort of problem ? you tube is fine,problem occur in totem or mplayer
I've had that happen before, closing firefox, and possibly doing a "kill -9 `pgrep flash`" from the terminal tends to fix it.
assuming you're talking about flash video
